citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC community member is an immediate family member of a fellow IACUC member and facility employee.
Appointing an IACUC community member that is related to a person affiliated with the facility compromises the ability of
that member to provide representation for the general community interests in the proper care and treatment of animals
used in the research program. At least one IACUC member shall not be affiliated in any way with the facility other than as
a member of the Committee and shall not be a member of the immediate family of a person who is affiliated with the
facility.
Correct by 20 October 2023.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The facility representative stated the IACUC has not prepared any semiannual reports of their semiannual reviews nor
forwarded semiannual reports to the Institutional Official. One of the IACUC functions is to assess activities involving
animals at the research facility and report its evaluations to the Institutional Official to ensure they are kept informed of the
status of both the animal use program and the research facilities. The IACUC shall prepare reports of its semiannual
reviews and submit the reports to the Institutional Official of the research facility at least once every 6 months.
Correct from this date forward of 25 August 2023 for all future semiannual reviews.

Review of the contingency plan did not occur on at least an annual basis. Annual reviews of the contingency plan help
ensure that identified emergency situations and measures are adequately addressed for the humane handling, treatment,
transportation, housing and care of animals in the event of an emergency. The plan must be reviewed and documented
by the research facility on at least an annual basis to ensure it adequately addresses the regulatory requirements of
contingency planning.
Correct by 22 September 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
